description: The Static Analysis Engine subsystem is a critical part of the "Code Analysis and Documentation Generation Tool," focusing on extracting deep structural, control flow, and semantic information from source code. It operates as a modular unit, providing essential data to other components of the larger system.

components.name: StaticAnalysisManager
components.description: This is the orchestrator of the entire static analysis process within the subsystem. It coordinates the analysis workflow, manages the interaction with language-specific parsers, and is responsible for storing and providing the generated analysis data, such as Control Flow Graphs (CFGs). It embodies the "Orchestration Engine" pattern for this specific domain.

components.name: GetCFGTool
components.description: This component acts as the primary interface for other parts of the system to access the static analysis results, specifically Control Flow Graphs. It queries the `StaticAnalysisManager` to retrieve CFG data, filters it for component-specific information, and formats it for external consumption. It serves as an internal "API Service" for analysis data.

components.name: LanguageServerAdapter
components.description: This component is responsible for abstracting and managing interactions with various external Language Servers. It handles language-specific parsing and analysis tasks, translating requests from the `StaticAnalysisManager` into calls to the appropriate language tools and processing their responses. This aligns with the "External Service Integration" pattern.

components.name: Unclassified
components.description: Component for all unclassified files and utility functions (Utility functions/External Libraries/Dependencies)
